description: Brown-haired cutie Will Braun snuck into his friend’s house to leave him a gift, but he was caught by his friend’s hot stepdad Ashland. The athletic, curious father figure opened the gift to find puzzle pieces, and proceeded to put them together discovering an image of naked, fit Will, and his big dick. Will is embarrassed, but that doesn’t last too long as horny Ashland pulls him in for a kiss and requests a taste of the real thing!
title: Puzzle Boy
